name: split-ca
description: simple module to split a single certificate authority chain file (aka: bundle, ca-bundle, ca-chain, etc.) into an array, as expected by the node.js tls api.
kwds: simple module to split a single certificate authority chain file (aka: bundle, ca-bundle, ca-chain, etc.) into an array, as expected by the node.js tls api. nodejs ca chain ssl tls https certificate authority bundle ca-bundle ca-chain split server
